definition: to be unwilling to pass on one's responsibilities to others
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
humane/kernel
(negative prefix)/not/no
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])

sentences.english: She had now the right to be his helpmate in his all kind deeds.
sentences.chinese: 現在，她已成了他一切仁慈行爲當仁不讓的助手。

sentences.english: When conditions are ripe, the scope of the cases accepted shall of course be responsibly expanded.
sentences.chinese: 當條件成熟時，當仁不讓地擴大受案範圍。

sentences.english: Then do thy office Muse, I teach thee how.
sentences.chinese: 當仁不讓吧，詩神，我要教你怎樣。

unprecedented and never to be duplicated/the first and the last/unmatched/unique

to follow up a victory and press home the attack/to pursue retreating enemy

to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
to be honest, ...
